text:
="preserve">Hurricane Bret was the only hurricane to Texas in the 1990s. The storm hit a lightly populated region of Texas on August 22-23, 1999. It was a small hurricane.
Bret struck south-central Texas with winds of.
There were four indirect deaths from the storm in Texas. Bret killed no people directly.
Damage from Bret was unusually low for a major hurricane.
